name: vscode-ttvchat-emitter
displayName: Ttv Chat Emitter for VS Code
description: An emitter extension for Twitch Chat which will login to Twitch using OAuth2 and emit messages received from Twitch.

ttvChatEmitter.announceBot.title: Announce Bot
ttvChatEmitter.announceBot.descriptoin: Whether or not the bot should announce its joining or leaving the chat room

ttvChatEmitter.joinMessage.title: Bot Join Message
ttvChatEmitter.joinMessage.default: VSCode Twitch Chat Emitter in the house!
ttvChatEmitter.joinMessage.description: The message the bot will say when joining a chat room

ttvChatEmitter.leaveMessage.title: Bot Leave Message
ttvChatEmitter.leaveMessage.default: VSCode Twitch Chat Emitter has left the building!

ttvChatEmitter.requiredBadges.title: Required Badges (if any)
ttvChatEmitter.requiredBadges.markdownDescription: A list of badges required to use the highlighter command. The use must have at least one of these badges to use the command. Leave blank for no requirement. Example: moderator, subscriber, vip.

items.errorMessage: Expected one of the following: admin, bits, broadcaster, global_admin, moderator, subscriber, staff, turbo, premium, follower
